message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $200 to start.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $200 is a bit steep. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $120. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $200 is my initial offer, but I'm willing to come down to $170 for you. This product is truly high-quality and I'm confident you'll find it valuable.
I appreciate the willingness to negotiate, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $140. Can you consider meeting me at this price?
